V03vinv10_u:3_0: kāśiṣu vāsavagrāmake senāṃjayo nāma bhikṣuḥ prativasati /
V03vinv10_u:3_1: tam āgamya vāsavagrāmakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārān kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:3_2: ye āgantukā bhikṣavo vāsavagrāmakam āgacchanti tān asau pratiśāmya sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayitvā mārgaśrame prativinodite yeṣu kuleṣu piṇḍakā upanibaddhās teṣu bhoktuṃ preṣayati /
V03vinv10_u:3_3: yāvad anyatamaḥ sālohito vāsavagrāmake varṣā uṣitaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:3_4: trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caran śrāvastīṃ anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:4_0: ācaritaṃ ṣaḍvargikāṇām aśūnyaṃ jetavanadvāram anyatarānyatareṇa ṣaḍvargikeṇa /
V03vinv10_u:4_2: tenāsau dūrata eva dṛṣṭo bakākāraśirāḥ pralambabhrūḥ /
V03vinv10_u:4_3: sa saṃlakṣayati / ko 'py ayaṃ sthaviro bhikṣur āgacchati /
V03vinv10_u:4_4: pratyudgantavyam iti / sa pratyudgataḥ / svāgataṃ svāgataṃ sthavira iti /
V03vinv10_u:4_5: sa kathayati / vande ācārya iti / sa saṃlakṣayati / mahallo batāyam* / nāyam ācāryaṃ jānīte nāpy upādhyāyam iti /
V03vinv10_u:4_7: vāsavagrāmakāt* / kiṃ tatra / vihāraḥ / kim asau vihāraḥ / āhosvid (MSV II 200) vighātaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:4_8: kīdṛśo vihāraḥ / kīdṛśo vighātaḥ / yatropakaraṇasaṃpat sa vihāraḥ /
V03vinv10_u:4_10: yady evaṃ vihāro 'sau yatra senāṃjayo nāma bhikṣuḥ prativasati /
V03vinv10_u:4_11: tam āgamya vāsavagrāmīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārān kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:4_13: tam asau pratiśāmya sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayitvā mārgaśrame prativinodite yeṣu kuleṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ piṇḍakā upanibaddhās teṣu bhoktuṃ preṣayati /
V03vinv10_u:5_0: ācaritaṃ ṣaḍvargikāṇāṃ yat kiṃcid eva śṛṇvanti tad rātrau saṃnipatya parasparam ārocayanti /
V03vinv10_u:5_1: nandopananda kiyac ciram asmābhiḥ kṛcchram udvoḍhavyam* /
V03vinv10_u:5_2: asti kiṃcid yuṣmākaṃ kiṃcic chrutaṃ yatrodārāvabhāso bhaved iti /
V03vinv10_u:5_3: upanandaḥ kathayati / asti / kāśiṣu vāsavagrāmake senāṃjayo nāma bhikṣuḥ prativasati /
V03vinv10_u:5_4: tam āgamya vāsavagrāmīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ pūrvavad yāvad bhoktuṃ preṣayati /
V03vinv10_u:5_6: te samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena vāsavagrāmakas tena cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:5_9: sa saṃlakṣayati / āgatā hy ete duṣṭhulasamudācārāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:5_11: no tu kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣayitavyā iti /
V03vinv10_u:5_14: teṣām eke kathayanti / nandopananda vayam anena mahallena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:5_15: no tu kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣitā iti /
V03vinv10_u:5_16: apare kathayanti / ekaṃ tāvat saṃpannaṃ kulāny api (286r1 = GBM 6.
V03vinv10_u:5_17: 884) preṣayiṣyatīti / (MSV II 201) yāvan navako bhikṣur āgataḥ /
V03vinv10_u:5_18: sa tena pratiśāmayitvā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārito mārgaśrame prativinodite kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣitaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:5_21: yadi tāvat pūrvam āgatās te vayam* /
V03vinv10_u:5_22: yadi vṛddhās te vayam* / atha bahuśrutās te vayam* / eṣa bhikṣur acireṇābhyāgato navakaḥ prakṛtijñaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:5_23: so 'nena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayitvā kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣito no tu vayam* /
V03vinv10_u:5_24: sa tair upālabdhaḥ / mahalla īdṛśas tvaṃ chandadveṣī /
V03vinv10_u:5_25: yadi tāvat pūrvam āgatās te vayaṃ pūrvavad yāvat* /
V03vinv10_u:5_26: sa tvayā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayitvā kulāni bhoktuṃ preṣito no tu vayam* /
V03vinv10_u:5_27: sthavirā kiṃcit parihīyate / ṣaḍvargikāḥ saṃjātāmarṣāḥ kathayanti /
V03vinv10_u:5_28: na tūṣṇīṃ sthātavyam* / tad aparaṃ prativadati / sa tair abhyāhataḥ / tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ / tais tasyācodayitvāsmārayitvā vastukarmapratijñāyā balād utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karmaṃ kṛtam* /
V03vinv10_u:5_29: sa saṃlakṣayati / duḥkhaṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prasādyante sukham aprasādyante /
V03vinv10_u:5_30: yadi sthāsyāmi vāsavagrāmīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prasādaṃ pravedayiṣyante /
V03vinv10_u:5_31: sarvadā prakramitavyam iti / sa samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena śrāvastī yena cārikāṃ prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa cārikāṃ (MSV II 202) caran śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv10_u:5_33: svāgataṃ svāgatam āyuṣman* / senāñjayin prītā vayaṃ tvaddarśanena no tv āgamanena /
V03vinv10_u:5_34: kiṃ kāraṇam* / tvām āgamya vāsavagrāmīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārān kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:5_36: asty etad evam* / mama tu ṣaḍvargikair acodayitvāsmārayitvā vastukarmapratijñāyā balād utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kṛtam /
V03vinv10_u:5_37: kiṃ kāraṇam* / tena yathāvṛttam ākhyātam* / te 'vadhyāyantaḥ kṣipanto vivācayanta etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
V03vinv10_u:5_38: bhagavān āha / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo vyagreṇa na bhikṣubhir acodayitvāsmārayitvā vastukarmapratijñayā balād utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kartavyam* /
V03vinv10_u:6_0: buddho bhagavān caṇpāyāṃ viharati gargāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre /
V03vinv10_u:6_1: tena khalu samayena ṣaḍvargikā bhikṣava imāny evaṃrūpāṇy adharmakarmāṇi kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:6_5: bhagavān āha / tasmān na bhikṣubhir imāny evaṃrūpāṇy adharmakarmāṇi karaṇīyāni /
V03vinv10_u:6_6: tadyathā adharmeṇa vyagrair adharmeṇa samagraiḥ dharmeṇa vyagraiḥ /
V03vinv10_u:8_0: na eka ekena na dvau na saṃbahulāḥ kṛtāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:8_1: na gaṇo gaṇasya karmāṇi paṃca saṃghakarmaṇāṃ svāminaḥ //
V03vinv10_u:9_1: buddho bhagavān caṇpāyāṃ viharati gargāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre /
V03vinv10_u:9_2: tena khalu samayena ṣaḍvargikā bhikṣava imāny evaṃrūpāṇy adharmakarmāṇi kurvanti /
V03vinv10_u:9_3: tadyathā eko 'py ekasya / eko dvayoḥ / ekaḥ saṃbahulānām* / dvāv api dvayoḥ / dvāv ekasya / dvau saṃbahulānām* / saṃbahulā api saṃbahulānām* /

V03vinv10_u:9_6: naikena dvayoḥ / naikena saṃbahulānām* / na dvābhyāṃ dvayoḥ / na dvābhyām ekasya / na dvābhyāṃ saṃbahulānām* / na saṃbahulaiḥ saṃbahulānām* /

V03vinv10_u:27_62: dharmakarma pūrvavat* / evam eva navakena cakrapeyālaṃ vistareṇa boddhavyam* /
V03vinv10_u:30_1: vyagrakarma / samagrakarma / vyagrakarma katamat* / yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāś chandārhebhyaś ca cchandenānītā bhavanti /
V03vinv10_u:30_2: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ prativahanti pratikrośanti /
V03vinv10_u:30_4_0: karmāṇi ca kurvanti / idam ucyate vyagrakarma / samagrakarma katamat* / yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ
V03vinv10_u:30_4_1: sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāś chandārhebhyaś ca cchandenānītā
V03vinv10_u:30_5: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā na prativahanti na pratikrośanti /
V03vinv10_u:31_2: daśānām upālin* / alajjinaḥ sāntarasya bālasya mūḍhasyāvyaktasyākuśalasya bahiḥsīmāyāṃ sthitasya īryāpathe cyutasya vācā asaṃvṛtasya /
V03vinv10_u:31_4: caturṇām upālin* / prakṛtisthitasya antaḥsīmāyāṃ sthitasya īryāpathād acyutasya vā vācā saṃyatasyeti /
V03vinv10_u:31_7: catvāry upālin / adharmeṇotkṣipanti vyagrā adharmeṇa samagrāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:31_8: dharmeṇa vyagrāḥ / dharmeṇa samagrāḥ / tatraikam utkṣepaṇakarma / yad idaṃ dharmeṇotkṣipanti samagrāḥ /
V03vinv10_u:31_11: adharmeṇosārayanti vyagrāḥ / adharmeṇa samagrāḥ / dharmeṇa vyagrāḥ / dharmeṇa samagrāḥ / tatraikam osāraṇakarma (288v1 = GBM 6.
